# Types of Consultancy Projects

## Common Types of Consultancy Projects

1. Client-Provided Data Analysis

2. Data Collection and Analysis (designs a data collection strategy, gathers data)

3. Experimental Design and Analysis

4. Model Development and Validation

5. Quality Control and Process Improvement

6. Survey Design and Analysis

7. Data Visualization and Reporting

8. Predictive Analytics and Forecasting

9. Statistical Software Implementation and Training

10. Training and workshops

## Exercise

Discuss the differences among various types of consultancy projects, highlighting the role of clients and providing examples.
